code: var setMode=function setMode(mode){return{type:'SET_MODE',payload:mode};};var setColor=function setColor(color){return{type:'SET_COLOR',payload:color};};var getTheme=function getTheme(){return{type:'GET_THEME'};};var exportDefault={setColor:setColor,setMode:setMode,getTheme:getTheme};export default exportDefault;
